speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0349/2006 ) by Mrs Berès on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs on the 2005 Annual Report of the European Bank ( 2006/2206(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0349/2006 ) by Mrs Berès on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs on the 2005 Annual Report of the European Bank ( 2006/2206(INI) ).
